title: WTB:  T206 Cicotte & Seitz in 4 or 5
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: WTB:  T206 Cicotte & Seitz in 4 or 5
posts.post_content:
WTB/WTTF:  T206 Cicotte & Seitz (SLer) in a 4 or 5.  I have these both as part of the completed set, just in lower grades - so looking to buy up and sell my SGC 30's.  If you have either and are in the VCP average ballpark price, I may be interested.

Thanks, as always, for your help!

Ed
